items.question: What is Playground?
items.answer: Playground is a sandbox that lets you try EUDI compatible issuance and verification flows without real user data.

items.question: Are these real documents?
items.answer: No. All documents here are demo samples for testing only. They have no legal effect and cannot be used in production.

items.question: Do I need a real EUDI Wallet?
items.answer: You need Folio Wallet on your phone to scan QR codes and see the documents in action. You do not need an officially certified national wallet to use this sandbox.

items.question: Which standards does Playground follow?
items.answer: Flows are based on the European Digital Identity Wallet Architecture and Reference Framework and use OpenID for Verifiable Credential Issuance and Verifiable Presentations under the hood.

items.question: Why do I start with Digital Identity?
items.answer: Digital Identity is the core document that other credentials can rely on. By issuing it once, you can reuse it in many verification scenarios.

items.question: Can I test verification without another device?
items.answer: Yes. You can open Folio Wallet and Playground on the same device or on two devices. QR codes work in both same device and cross device scenarios.
